title: Restore missing scripts functionality

requirements.text: Restore the script listing functionality on the homepage so that all public scripts are displayed in the ScriptGrid component
acceptanceCriteria: Scripts are visible on the homepage in a grid layout
ScriptCard components display for each script with title, description, category, and author
Empty state shows when no scripts exist

requirements.text: Ensure the My Scripts page correctly displays scripts owned by the authenticated user with edit and delete functionality
acceptanceCriteria: Authenticated users can view their own scripts on the My Scripts page
Edit and delete buttons are functional for user's own scripts

requirements.text: Verify the script detail page loads and displays individual script content with syntax highlighting and metadata
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking a script card navigates to its detail page
Full script code is displayed with syntax highlighting
Script metadata (author, category, dates) is visible

requirements.text: Ensure the backend script CRUD operations are functioning correctly and returning data to the frontend queries
acceptanceCriteria: getScriptsByOwner returns scripts filtered by owner principal
getScript returns individual script details by ID

constraints: Maintain existing authentication flow using Internet Identity
Preserve the single-actor backend architecture in backend/main.mo
Keep immutable frontend paths unchanged (hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, hooks/useActor.ts, main.tsx, components/ui)
nonGoals: Adding new script features beyond restoration
Changing the visual design or branding
